data.name: Mature for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
Mature DLC for Clip Maker contain mature characters, dressed in different wardrobe (undressable). You can make excellent art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics, videos, films and clips. Or just have a fun with:

Grandma 1
Grandma 2
Grandma 3
Grandma 4
Grandma 5
Grandpa 1
Grandpa 2
Grandpa 3
Grandpa 4
Grandpa 5

All characters can be fully undressed, has the intimate body details and can be transgender.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

Please post images or links to your 18+ art in the Discord, because of post public nudity art is not allowed in the discussions on Steam

data.short_description: Mature for Clip maker - get a revolutionary new game and have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips, art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics and videos or just have fun with matures.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC users can take off all clothes from the characters, make them completely naked.
